Name: Last Dawn
About the game: Last Dawn is a short first-person exploration game set in the year 2082. While attempting to flee a dystopian city, your ship was shot down. You awake in a cold wasteland known as the Old World. You must find a way out, but be careful. You are not alone here. FIND THE TERMINALS You will have to find the five terminals and deactivate them to escape. HIDE You will be hunted by the city's android guards. Avoid being spotted and captured. RUN If you are spotted the guards will run after you and attempt to capture you. It's best to run and find another way around them. ESCAPE Once all five terminals are deactivated the door will open, allowing you to escape.
